au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1=14m_L2=2m_offset_apx10_JM2015
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(1200,300) # Drive entrance aperture to 50 mm square driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive guide to g2 driveGuide(guideConfig.g2) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g2) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 10 mm sics.drive('apx', -72) # Drive beamstops up selBs(3) # set beamcentres sics.set('beamcenterx', 35.1197) sics.set('beamcenterz', 95.8257)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(35, 100) # Drive attenuator to 300 driveAtt(300)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(35, 0) driveBsz(261)
